original: Ekblom, Olof (Olle), landshövding, Jönköping, f. 2/1/92 i Munktorp, Väst-mani. 1., av kyrkoh. J. E. E. o. Mimmi Boèthius. G. 22 m. Greta Engström. — Fil. mag. i Upps. 16. Aman. i soc:styr. 18, sekr. å förlikn :mannaexp. 21, förlikn :man i arb:tvister 26-38, landshövd. i Jönköp. 1. sed. 38. Led. O’, sekr. i särs;k. förlikn :komm., sekr. i 26 års arb :fredsdeleg., arb :fredskonf. 28, 29 års arb :fredsdeleg., led. av arb :-lösh :komm. 26-34, av 27 års arb :freds-sakk., ordf. i komm. ang. statstj :m. ställn. v. arb :konfl. 38, i järnv. skilje-domst. sed. 44, i 44 års pens :utredn., i 45 års trafiksäkerhetskomm., i 46 års trafiksäkerhetskampanj. Skr.: upps. ang. arb:tvister, kollektivavtal, medling o. skiljedom samt arb :löner bl. a. i Soc. han-db. o. Sv:es ekon. hist. under o. efter världskriget. KNOLkl, KV02kl.
translated: Ekblom, Olof (Olle), governor, Jönköping, b. 2/1/92 in Munktorp, Västmanland. Son of vicar J.E.E. and Mimmi Boèthius. Married in 1922 to Greta Engström. - Holds a BA from Uppsala University in 1916. He then served as a trainee in social administration in 1918, secretary at the National Board of Mediation and Conciliation in 1921, conciliator in labor disputes from 1926-1938, and governor of Jönköping since 1938. He has been a member, secretary and vice-chairman of various arbitration committees, representative for Sweden at arbitration conferences in 1928 and 1929, a member of the unemployment committee from 1926-1934, and chairman of the state administrative committee on labor disputes in 1938. He served as the chairman of the railway arbitration court since 1944, on the pension inquiry committee in 1944, traffic safety committee in 1945, and traffic safety campaign in 1946. He has written about labor disputes, collective agreements, mediation, and arbitration, as well as salaries in various publications. Honorary Commander of the Royal Order of the Polar Star with diamonds. Knight of the Order of the North Star with the Grand Cross.
